original_text: Which was the son of Melchi, which was the son of Addi, which was the son of Cosam, which was the son of Elmodam, which was the son of Er,
korean_text: 그 위는 멜기요 그 위는 앗디요 그 위는 고삼이요 그 위는 엘마담이요 그 위는 에르요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Melchi
which was the son of Addi
which was the son of Cosam
which was the son of Elmodam
which was the son of Er
